name: Preludium
overview: Preludium is an educational game with arcade elements. The game takes place in the land called Chochland. Krzysztof's goal is reaching the stone with orthographic puzzle. The correct answer to the three tasks opens the door to the next room. The correct spelling indicated at the bottom of the screen needs to be selected from two different choices by using the left or right cursor keys and pressing the fire button. Incorrect answers and contact with obstacles takes one energy level. Topping energy withdraws the players of the two chambers. Arcade part of the game requires a jump over obstacles and avoidance of hostile creatures.
